website_summaries.verdict: This basic wet shaving set makes a great starter kit for younger shavers, and a good transition from electric or cartridge razors for experienced users. We recommend shopping for quality replacement blades right away.
pros: Merkur long-handled razor is exceptionally good
Soap is gentle on sensitive skin
Provides very close shaves compared to cartridge razors and shaving cream
cons: Shaving soap is glycerin-based – not ideal for lather

customer_reviews.title: Nice razor, good quality kit.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to go back to the double edge safety razor of my youth. Got tired of the very expensive multi blade refills of my razors. The razor handle is well made and well balanced in my hand. the included Merkur blade was sharp enough to provide me with a nice close shave. I like the little metal brush / razor holder as well as the little soap holder. It takes a little bit of getting used to shaving with these old style razors, but they work very well, and I expect I'll save a lot of money by purchasing the much more economical DE blades available.
customer_reviews.author: some old guy

customer_reviews.title: The brush is perfect texture for even application and coverage
customer_reviews.text: This set is very attractive and cleans very well. Initially I was worried about water spotting but the finish returns to mirror quality with just a towel wipe-down. The brush is perfect texture for even application and coverage. I tried using the shave soap it came with initially but switched back to a creme as the soap was not working well with my skin type. Lastly, the razor is fantastic in both form and function. I have been using feather blades and once I was used to the feel of this tool I've had the best shaves of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice set, I was new to wet shaving and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set, I was new to wet shaving and this looked like a good starter kit. Now that I'm a little more experienced I have two complaints 1) it was overpriced (I paid around $100), 2) the brush is not very good. I immediately had to buy a replacement brush. The Merkur razor is very nice, the stand is pretty nice, the bowl looks nice but you could probably get the same thing at the dollar store, and the soap last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet grooming
customer_reviews.text: I got this mainly to do grooming on my maine coon cat. The first couple times i used it, he hated it. I think it was just because his hair was so thick, But after the 2nd or third time, he seemed to enjoy it (i learned to warm the soap). I am going to try to return it (my cat died), i will follow up to comment on how their return policy works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of positive, one negative.
customer_reviews.text: For all you get with this gift set it's a good deal especially for someone just starting out with a double edge razor. Razor is very good 5 star, no question. Brush seems good quality but have nothing to compare it to, will give it a 5 star. The soap I haven't tried yet because I bought something else, can't rate it. As for the bowl and the stand, look good, do their job. But, they bring down the overall rating because they are made in Taiwan. Overall, yes, good products and do recommend these products.
customer_reviews.author: S & S

customer_reviews.title: Okay for a starter set.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set when I first started wet shaving with a DE razor. The brush does its job but there's far better ones out there that won't cost you too much. The bowl is a little too small for my liking, and the stand isn't very good. The Colonel Conk soap is decent enough but the scent disappears once you lather it. The real star of the set is the Merkur 23C razor it comes with. I've tried many different DE razors since starting but none of them has given me as good of a shave as I get with the 23C.
customer_reviews.author: eric fisher

customer_reviews.title: I definitely recommend ordering plenty of extra razors as they do not ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set as a gift for my 17-year-old son, together with an assortment of lathering soaps sold by the same seller. The materials are heavy, perhaps brass plated chrome. I definitely recommend ordering plenty of extra razors as they do not seem to last as long as multi blade disposables
customer_reviews.author: amham

customer_reviews.title: A great shaving set
customer_reviews.text: A great shaving set, although I felt the need to switch to another shaving soap as the included one didn't lather as well as I'd hoped. The Safety razor itself holds up nicely when paired with a good blade, I chose Personnaand change to a new one about once a week. Recommend watching a video for first time safety blade users. Definitely a good investment and a very close shave.
customer_reviews.author: Luis A

customer_reviews.title: I love the badger brush
customer_reviews.text: I love the badger brush. Its like shaving with a wild animal tail to spread your lather on your face. The price is high enough where you think you have something really nice. This is the second one I have bought. This was a gift. Watch out it is sharp. My 15 year old son recently started shaving to my surprise ( not his face but his manhood) I heard him yelling down the stairs for me to come up because he was bleeding. So now he has his own set to shave with and I am keeping the new one.
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT BUY
customer_reviews.text: bought this for husband. he's super happy with it and it looks great on the bathroom counter. The soap smells wonderful (some other ones he has tried i hated the smell but this one smells great) Overall the set looks super classy and the bristles on the brush are full, soft and look like they will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: DePlume

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous shaving kit - it goes well with my bathroom fixtures. We've owned Merkur Safety Razors for years, and this one is just as nice as the others. My husband left his at our camper home, so I bought him this one to keep here so that he can keep the other at the camper. He likes the soap that this came with.
customer_reviews.author: ReidalongTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great kit with components exceeding my expectation.
customer_reviews.text: Have truly enjoyed transitioning to shaving like a man's man. I am very pleased with this purchase and have encouraged my buddies to give it a try. This brush is astonishing! It's far better (fluffier, denser, softer, soaks up nicely, dries quickly and regularly, lathers like a beast with rabies) than any other brush I've found or seen available locally, and it's much less expensive. If I had to do it all over again... I'd buy two of these kits and give one to my best friend.
customer_reviews.author: ADVANSYS

customer_reviews.title: Nice set. Felt came off the bottom of mine ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Felt came off the bottom of mine in about a month. Holder is solid and heavy Soap dish is really small and light but it will warm up really fast. Mouth is about same size as a tennis ball so I don't use it anymore. Brush is great. Good heavy feel, with nice big handle. No excess loss of bristles that I have noticed. Handel is smooth metal so it can/does get slippery. Soap smelled good but I gave it to my son to use since I have my own.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Goza

customer_reviews.title: Quality product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product that has held well. The brush was replaced about a year after purchase to ensure proper hygiene. Upon replacement, the brush was in good shape, which is a reflection of the craftsmanship of the product! The base, soap bowl and razor have all held up well years after purchase. I would buy this product as a gift for others!
customer_reviews.author: Adrean

customer_reviews.title: Going back
customer_reviews.text: What is with this razor? I put in a replacement blade (Astra) and it doesn't even shave my beard. On closer inspection there is such a large gap between the safety edge and the blade it does not come close enough to cut anything.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance- Customer Since 1998

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for fathers day, he always breaks out bad when shaving using any type of razor, decided to give this a try, he loves it and now shaves almost daily, he usually has a five o'clock shadow by noon but it seems to slow down the growth, 4 stars because we're having issues with the bowl and soap puck, it doesn't exactly match up, may need to purchase a new bowl in order to properly use the puck to get a good lather or whip otherwise the puck just spins in circles and doesn't stay put.
customer_reviews.author: TazzyMarie123

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for my husband's dad. It's nicer than the set we have for ourselves. The badger bristle brush is gorgeous. Everything in the set matches great and are all a heavy metal chrome-plated-like material. The merkur razors are the best, of course. The soap we got was the lime, which smells nicer than you'd think. It was a great deal for the money; better than anything else I saw. I can't wait to see him open it on Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: no complaints here
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent beginners kit. I have used the soap a few times, its OK, I use a cream now. I like the stand its really nice the bowl is also really nice. Now the brush is pretty good. There is much better brushes out there no doubt. However for the price this kit is really a winner in my eyes. Other than the soap its an awesome kit for someone starting out with safety razors.
customer_reviews.author: Vanisher187

customer_reviews.title: Nice set.  get it.
customer_reviews.text: Great kit for a starter or gift. I got this for my brother and he loves it. You save so much money using a safety razor over those ridiculous 6-bladed, battery-operated, pieces of crap and you get a closer shave to boot. This set is nice with real badger brush and a nice substantial feel to the razor. I definitely recommend for anyone who shaves above the shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got for eldest son as part of graduation giftage. He loves it, and so do I. Well, I hinted so maybe I'll get one for Christmas! Son did say that if you're not careful you can cut yourself, but I've cut myself with a 3 blade Gillete Mach 3, so no surprise! It's a razor blade! It's sharp! I guess I'll have to find out if it can handle my beard (very tough and full), and how long blades last. I'll try to remember to update.
customer_reviews.author: Hill

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for a better shave set.
customer_reviews.text: The set is very handsome; my husband was impressed with the appearance as well. The brush and safety razor are very well made; their weight confirms the quality of craftsmanship. My husband liked the soap. Other have complained about it being much like a "cheap glycerin soap" but it's not. The soap is very appropriate for this type of shaving and lathers well in the bowl with the brush. I would recommend this item to anyone. It's worth the price; after all, holding a razor to one's face on a daily basis is not something to take lightly. Plus, it looks very classy in our bathroom unlike the other shaving apparatuses he had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Egger

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a beginner safety razor set to see if it was something I could get in to. While basic and not the most expensive of products, these do what they need to do and are great learning pieces. The soap bowl is a little small for my taste but I've learn most are when purchased for the Col's soaps. I purchased another bowl which I use for proraso soaps and keep this bowl for traveling. If a beginner and want to have a matching set at a great price, this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shaving Gift Set with Merkur Safety Razor
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this kit for about six weeks now and so far, so good. The workmanship is good and the chrome finish looks professional. Both the bowl and stand are made in Taiwan, the brush is from Great Britain and the razor is made in Germany. The soap is okay, but I ended up buying something different since I couldn't get it to lather very well (probably my technique). I'm new to using a safety razor, and would recommend this kit to anyone thinking of getting started. FYI - There are videos on "you tube" on how to use a safety razor, this is how I learned.
customer_reviews.author: Tim L. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: great quality but disappointed in the box it came in.
customer_reviews.text: The product is the best out there on the market. I bought these for all 13 of our groomsmen gifts. The only thing is I'm a little disappointed that the boxes that the sets came in were totally smashed. I had to spend more money and get presentable boxes to give as a gift. At almost 90 dollars they should come in a nice box that you could actually give as a gift since they recommend this as A gift set.
customer_reviews.author: Orrisclan4

customer_reviews.title: Memories, relived
customer_reviews.text: The man of my life was reminiscing about watching his father shave while he was a boy. Aha!! Note to self--a wonderful Christmas present to my beloved! A very rich, sophisticated set, I was very pleased with this purchase. And the man? Tears in his eyes as he immediately went to the master bath to set up his shaving set, and shave the way "my dad did" Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tonette Renee

customer_reviews.title: Saves Tons of Money and is very Durable!
customer_reviews.text: This set is still holding up after 3 years of weekly use. The metal cleans up nicely. We've saved a lot of money not buying disposable razors. The brush bristles did pop out of the metal holder, but we used some gorilla glue to reattach with no further issues. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: VAHometown

customer_reviews.title: ... getting razor bumps while spending 50 dollars on razors like every few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my military boyfriend after him always complaining about having to shave every day and getting razor bumps while spending 50 dollars on razors like every few weeks. He's taking a bit getting comfortable with it and not being scared but he said it's the best shave he's had! The shaving soap that comes with this is more for oily skin though so if you have dry skin I would also order another shaving soap. Also the little set up is cute!
customer_reviews.author: sami

customer_reviews.title: A gift for father's day
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loved it! He gets this "dashing manly" look on his face ever time he uses it, haha, totally worth it plus it works great! I only wish it came with brush care instructions.. not everybody knows how to take care of brushes I guess. We're good now but it would have been handy the first time- thx!
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Placed

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend and he loves it. It looks great, shaves very well, and the soap lasts FOREVER (and smells great!). I ordered an additional soap four pack and 100 blades with this set and I'm fairly confident that he'll be set for the next five years. This set makes a really good gift for someone you love!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: This set is AWESOME. Like others have said, the bowl is a bit small, but no big deal. Absolutely wonderful for my first safety razor set. I would, however, recommend just the Merkur Razor/Stand/Brush deal, unless you like the asthetics of the cup.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Get your own Bowl
customer_reviews.text: The kit is good, but the bowl you get is not like the one pictured. The one I have is a single part bowl, while the pictured one has a built in stand/ring on the bottom. The brush did feel a little scratchy at first, but after reading about how to shampoo and condition it before use it's become pretty comfortable for me. Having bought this kit I'd recommend saving yourself $20 and get the kit without the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Tufnel

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This set will let you enjoy shaving. It's a ritual to be completed as you pamper your face into a silky-smooth work of art. Remember to shave to reduce hair, not remove completely with a single stroke. Takes longer than the eight-bladed monstrosities pushed by the television, but the difference is fantastic. I recommend buying a couple of styptic pencils to stop the inevitable bleeding.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Ryuujin

customer_reviews.title: The stand does hold the shaver and the brush nicely. The brush itself feels a little cheap
customer_reviews.text: Only the razor is Merkur. The stand and the badger brush are made in taiwan/china. So is the bowl. It came with a lime colonel conk shaving soap which I am afraid to try. The stand does hold the shaver and the brush nicely. The brush itself feels a little cheap. Maybe purchased individually you can get better item for same or slightly more.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: GREAT kit for a first-time safety shaver!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my husband, who had become really enamored with the idea of shaving with a safety razor. I was excited at how quickly it arrived, and how pretty the set was. Even better, the soap they send smells WONDERFUL! My husband has never had such a great shave, and his face feels smoother than mine does afterwards! I really can't support this product enough, my husband loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Cox

customer_reviews.title: Merkur is a qualityi product
customer_reviews.text: This extra length razor is a bit heavy and not as nimble as I'd like, I should have gotten the regular length. The stand is nice and classy. The soap doesn't foam up much and does not lubricate as well as gel. The razor clogs up with hair like my cheap disposable razor. It takes a few more minutes to use a safety razor system.
customer_reviews.author: Tennis Kanaka

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted and needed
customer_reviews.text: Despite what other reviewers said I received exactly what is displayed here. The piece is heavy enough to feel sturdy while comfortable enough to get a good shave with. The brush is comfortable and feels FANTASTIC when you're applying the hot, foamed soap. The only words of wisdom are to start doing this slowly and learn how to shave with a safety razor online. I wouldn't suggest trying it for the first time before a date or you'll end up like the old cartoons with little cuts all over your face. This piece is masculine, classy, and a perfect addition to any mans bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Something Special
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this gift for my husband. He's always wanted a professional, stylish shaving stand and soap dish for years. When I received and opened it, I was impressed because I'm picky and like quality items. I really loved it! I really believe he's going to love it, also, and get many years of use. I know he'll keep it out on display.
customer_reviews.author: sylviat

customer_reviews.title: Last razor I will ever have to buy.
customer_reviews.text: My Dad taught me to shave with one of these types of razors decades ago. I kept slicing myself up back then though so I went to disposable razors & have used them ever since. I shave my head & face everyday for work & the razor burn, ingrown hairs, & blemishes were a nuisance. I just received this today & it's absolutely amazing. I just gave away almost $100 worth of disposable razor junk...excellent razor, & closest shave ever!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jones

customer_reviews.title: Decent starter kid but better off buying adjustable and everything separently
customer_reviews.text: Good starter kit but better buying everything individually and spending slightly more for better products. Adjustable razors are 100 time better but this razor is decent for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: The Outdoor Firefighter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the man expecting a little more from his shaving experience
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend's birthday. He loves it! It definitely gives him the close shave that he was looking for. He will never go back to plastic shavers again! No issues at all with this product. No rust or faulty parts. I do believe that it will stand up to the test of time. Would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Bentsen

customer_reviews.title: A close shave - and a good thing.
customer_reviews.text: This gives me a close, comfortable shave, without the issue of whiskers getting caught between the multiple blades you have in disposable razors. I would say that this is the next best thing to a barber shave. I also like the smell of the soap provided.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cauhape

customer_reviews.title: Great Razor Set
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy shaving with this product. I am very happy and could not be more satisfied. The stand is black in color and not chrome as in the photo. It looks classic on the sink and is well made. I like the long handled razor for shaving.
customer_reviews.author: BH1970

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for my husaband's birthday
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for my husband, as I was told I hit a homerun. It was beautiful and well received. The only mistake I made was I didn't give enough time for it to arrive on time. I asked him for the rating on this item and he gives it five stars. I look forward to seeing what other items I might be able to purchase from this company. Just give yourself time to receive (about 2-3 weeks).
customer_reviews.author: clott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his shaving set so much, he bought another one for his friend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Bristle fall out in month 10
customer_reviews.text: The product as a whole is good, but the bristle brush started losing hairs like crazy in month 10. I wrote the company and they said: "The bristles are held in by a knot of glue, and you will lose a few bristles from time to time." even though I told them I only started losing bristles in month 10 but then many each time I shaved, which dramatically interfered with shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Pfeiffer, Commander of Nothing

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: i bought this as a gift for my dad. It is a very nice good quality set. I bought a cedar box to gift it in since it comes as a set but not in any packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Moises

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my husband as an anniversary present after I had done quite a bit of research. He really loves the set, even though he had never actually considered using a safety razor. I also purchased the Leisureguy's Guide to Gourmet Shaving: Shaving Made Enjoyable. There are several youtube videos on wet shaving with a safety razor that are helpful to the novice. The shave is so close that he can shave at night when he is not pressed for time. I was so taken with how close the shave is and how economical it is that I ordered a Merkur long-handle safety razor for myself.
customer_reviews.author: S. Summers

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Shave!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this safety razor shaving kit for Christmas along with a styptic pencil to help with the shaving nicks that my wife was sure I would inevitably receive due to never having used an "old school" safety razor before. This is one of the best Christmas gifts I've ever received. The only time I've ever had a shave this close was by a professional barber with a straight razor. The kit came complete with Merkur safety razor, badger tail shaving brush, soap, bowl and razor/brush holder. By the way, still haven't had to open the styptic pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: I bought this hoping it would simply do its job ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would simply do its job. The distance between the razor and the guard is too long. Put in simple terms, this safety razor does NOT shave. The bristles of the Badger hair brush frizz out even when wet. If you plan on buying a safety razor, buy a more expensive one or one that has a reputation for actually working.
customer_reviews.author: Salman Al- Mutawa

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shaving Kit
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit, Merkur makes a great razor and with the stand, bowl, soap and badger brush you are ready to go as soon as it arrives. I lost my razor long ago and bought this kit. I would recommend it to anyone, beginner or pro! Amazon offers a variety of shaving soaps as well as other shaving accessories. PS CC,TX
customer_reviews.author: T55Guy

customer_reviews.title: Everything is great except for the bowl
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great except for the bowl. It is too small, makes it hard to foam soap in. Luckily I had a spare bowl from another set.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny and Julieta

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Great combo!! I have to say that I am impressed with it. Bowl is a great size. Brush is actually a good quality. For comparable sets I would have spent $70 + .
customer_reviews.author: C.F Missouri dad

customer_reviews.title: boyfriend birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: He loved it. He said he was waiting to get himself one. So far, he says the shave is great. He looks forward to shaving in the morning and it all sits neatly on the counter. I'd say you should get aftershave and extra razors if you get this kit. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: 0xyjen

customer_reviews.title: If your man doesn't shave with this, do you even have a man?
customer_reviews.text: If your man doesn't shave with this, do you even have a man?
customer_reviews.author: Key_Yak_J

customer_reviews.title: Got as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a family member and have heard nothing but good things about it. As far as purchasing, I had no problems at all. Was shipped on time (maybe even a day early), it was packed well and exactly as advertised. I would definitely do business with the seller again. Thanks for a smooth purchasing experience!
customer_reviews.author: mandak1014

customer_reviews.title: The bowl is poor quality, flimsy metal
customer_reviews.text: Not the right razor, comes with a long handled razor instead. Not really a set, none of the metals match. Seller must have just accumulated the different pieces from other companies and started selling them with the Merkur razor. The bowl is poor quality, flimsy metal. Haven't used the soap yet.
customer_reviews.author: aef

customer_reviews.title: I won't spend this much on this again
customer_reviews.text: Next time, I would just buy the razor and a shaving foam spray from grocery store for half the money
customer_reviews.author: Zahra Aminzare

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for husband or father.
customer_reviews.text: My son gave this, along with a case to carry the razor, to my husband for Christmas. Just enough old world barber shop charm, without bringing on the flat edged blade! The soap lathers well, and he gets a nice, close shave. Great as a gift, as the set is complete.
customer_reviews.author: *CWS*

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality
customer_reviews.text: Super high quality. Bought one for my uncle as a gift. He totally loves it. Just bought another one for him so that he can keep one set at office :]
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great Set for a new shaver
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as my introduction to shaving with a safety razor. Like many others, I had grown tired of the expense of cartridge shaving. This is a great set to get you started. It comes with everything you need to start shaving. The Merkur razor is excellent and the whole set looks and performs well. There is a learning curve, but you can watch any of the YouTube videos on the subject to get great tips and advice. Speaking of advice, be sure to buy a sampler pack of blades to try with your new razor. Every face and beard is different, so a sampler pack will let you determine which blade works best for you.
customer_reviews.author: robrockettx

customer_reviews.title: not for tough beards
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting to cut shaving costs I have a tough beard a 1 pm shadow. this is great for everyday shaving but for me 2 days it will not shave at all. will keep it like the soap and brush is great
customer_reviews.author: Henry Crockett

customer_reviews.title: Merkur Safety Razor!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for this product. I bought this for my husband and he will never use a disposable. He loves the close shave and will never use any other razor but Merkur from Amazon. Thank you so much! Seller had this at our home way before the date estimated.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Great razor to have for that close shave. If you use disposable razors this razor will take a while to get use to because the head is wider than what you would be used to.
customer_reviews.author: N3ka

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: After tons of research, this is the brand to go with. Bought if for my husband for Christmas and he absolutely loves it. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.

customer_reviews.title: All is great. What a nice set
customer_reviews.text: All is great. What a nice set. I was using an online service for shaving before switching to the straight blade razor. The weight is appropriate and the set is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Globerman

customer_reviews.title: delivers An excellent shaving experience
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, delivers An excellent shaving experience. Not to aggressive, but very close. Only comes with one rather low quality blade though, I would have expected at least a 5 pack, given the cheap cost of blades.
customer_reviews.author: Gray L.

customer_reviews.title: While I think it's a good set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this item for my husband for Christmas as a starter set. While I think it's a good set for the price, he has only been using it for a month now and the brush included is completely falling apart. A significant amount of the badger bristles have fallen out at this point and it can no longer be used. On a more positive note, the shaving soap has a wonderful smell and it really is a nice looking set.
customer_reviews.author: Darcie Bristow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for dad!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set for my dad for his birthday. He loved it! It has everything one would need to start shaving with a DE safety razor except the blades (I had a bunch from a variety pack I previously ordered). I highly recommend this for anyone interested in getting into DE wet shaving.
customer_reviews.author: J Nordy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé shaves his face and his head a few times a week and we were disappointed with how this held up. The brush fell out of the holder less than 3 months later.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Badger Brush
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good in the set except the brush. Part way through its first use the brush head detached itself from the metal body. I had to jam the brush back into the body to use it again. Once it was jammed back together tons of hairs came out of the brush while lathering. Hairs all over my face. Gross. The bright spot is the metal stand and Merkur razor. The are both of a high quality. If the brush worked better I would give the set a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C Ruckdaschel

customer_reviews.title: Nice shave set!

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit!

customer_reviews.title: New user is impressed

I've seen complaints about the bowl being too small; it might be a tad but too small but you can still get a decent lather going in it. The brush is eh when creating a lather and is why I knocked it down a star but that's probably due to my lack of experience. Razor is great and the stand is very convenient. Overall, a very solid product.

customer_reviews.title: To clarify.
customer_reviews.text: My order was exactly what I expected it to be, shy of one misconception. I assumed there would be more than one blade with the set, there was not. While this does not show any fault on the provider I think a warning in the description would be a good idea, many people buy this bundle as a starter set and may find the clarification useful.
